summary: THE VEHICLE WILL FROM TIME TO TIME SUDDENLY ACCELERATE ON  ITS OWN WITHOUT WARNING. THIS HAS OCCURRED TWICE IN THE PAST FEW WEEKS. HAS OCCURRED WHILE SLOWING TO COME TO A STOP AND WHILE SPEEDING UP TO NORMAL OPERATING SPEEDS. WHEN IT HAPPENS BRAKING DOES NOT STOP THE ACCELERATION THE SPEED CONTINUES TO INCREASE.
